Package com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm

Class LicenseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.penthera.virtuososdk.client.drm.LicenseManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILicenseManager
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CastLabsLicenseManager
    public class LicenseManager
extends Object
implements ILicenseManager
    Default implementation of the ILicenseManager interface. This class should be extended to override the getLicenseAcquistionUrlForAsset method. For the SDK to pick up the new LicenseManager implementation class an application must replace the meta-data tag named "com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl" and provide the full class name as the value. 
     
 <meta-data tools:replace="android:value"
          android:name="com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl"
          android:value="com.penthera.harness.drm.HarnessLicenseManager"/>

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ILicenseManager getInstance​(Context context)
        Retrieve the LicenseManager instance. The returned instance is of the class specified in the meta-data tag named com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl in the applications manifest. If the application has not replaced the SDK meta-data then an instance of LicenseManager is returned.
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use for reading the manifest and retrieving the class name.
        Returns:
        Implementation of an ILicenseManager

      • buildWithAsset

        public static ILicenseManager buildWithAsset​(Context context,
                                             IAsset asset)
        Retrieve the LicenseManager instance with an intialised IAsset. The returned instance is of the class specified in the meta-data tag named com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl in the applications manifest. If the application has not replaced the SDK meta-data then an instance of LicenseManager is returned. The default implementation of this method returns a chained call of getInstance(Context) and withAsset(IAsset).
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use for reading the manifest and retrieving the class name.
        asset - The IAsset to be used by the LicenseManager.
        Returns:
        Implementation of an ILicenseManager with an initiliased asset.

      • buildWithAssetId

        public static ILicenseManager buildWithAssetId​(Context context,
                                               String assetId)
        Retrieve the LicenseManager instance with an intialised Asset Id. The returned instance is of the class specified in the meta-data tag named com.penthera.virtuososdk.license.manager.impl in the applications manifest. If the application has not replaced the SDK meta-data then an instance of LicenseManager is returned. The default implementation of this method returns a chained call of getInstance(Context) and withAssetId(String).
        Parameters:
        context - Context to use for reading the manifest and retrieving the class name.
        assetId - The Asset Id used by your catalog to identify the asset.
        Returns:
        Implementation of an ILicenseManager with an initiliased asset.

      • withAsset

        public ILicenseManager withAsset​(IAsset asset)
        Description copied from interface: ILicenseManager
        Set the asset that requires a license. This allows generation of request properties from the asset if needed.
        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • withAssetId

        public ILicenseManager withAssetId​(String assetId)
        Description copied from interface: ILicenseManager
        Set the remote id of the asset that requires a license. This allows generation of request properties from the asset if needed. The id can be used to generate license requests if an IAsset has not yet been added to the SDK.
        Specified by:
        withAssetId in interface ILicenseManager
        Parameters:
        assetId - The asset id from your catalog.
        Returns:
        The License Manager.

      • getLicenseAcquistionUrl

        public String getLicenseAcquistionUrl()
        Retrieve the URL for requesting the assets license. This method will throw a NotImplementedException, it needs to be overridden by customers. It should return the complete URL for requesting the license. That is; it should return the the license server url plus any query parameters that are needed by the licensing server to grant the license.
        Specified by:
        getLicenseAcquistionUrl in interface ILicenseManager
        Returns:
        The Url to be used when requesting the license.

                                MediaDrm.KeyRequest request)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: ILicenseManager
        Request the key from the licensing server.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getKeyRequestProperties

        public Map<String,​String> getKeyRequestProperties()
        Map of header properties that should be added to the request. This implementation returns a Map with a single entry. The entry sets the Content-Type of the request to application/octet-stream.
        Specified by:
        getKeyRequestProperties in interface ILicenseManager
        Returns:
        Map of request properties.

      • saveKey

        public boolean saveKey​(Context context,
                       String cacheId,
                       byte[] keyset)
        Description copied from interface: ILicenseManager
        Save the key set Id so license can be retrieved when offline. Either the asset or the assetId must have been set with ILicenseManager.withAsset(IAsset) or ILicenseManager.withAssetId(String) for the save to be successful.
        Specified by:
        saveKey in interface ILicenseManager
        Parameters:
        context - The context to use for saving the key.
        cacheId - The id to be used by the offline cache.
        keyset - The key set ID.
        Returns:
        true if the key was saved.
